title: Sarah Ferguson's charity to close days after new Epstein revelations
desc: Sarah's Trust announced it was shutting "for the foreseeable future" after "some months" of discussion.

title: Families with children battling cancer to have travel costs covered
desc: The government sets aside £10 million a year to help families and young people under 24 access cancer treatment.

title: Teachers in NSW schools face sack for hate speech in classrooms, premier says
desc: Teachers or school staff found to have breached bolstered NSW hate speech laws face tough sanctions, including the possibility of being fired.

title: Amid wedding rumours with Dhanush, actress Mrunal Thakur shares how love changes you into a ‘better person’
desc: Amidst wedding rumours with Dhanush, Mrunal Thakur shared her profound views on love, calling it a transformative force that fosters emotional growth and healing for everyone. She emphasised that generosity in love transcends gender. The actress is currently promoting her music video Bheegi Bheegi and has an upcoming film Do Deewane Seher Mein.
